data.name: B1NARY
data.detailed_description:
Free Wallpapers of the Cast here using Wallpaper Engine!
https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198118808023/myworkshopfiles/?snr=1_5_9_

It's 2040. Humanity has entered another phase in it's evolution: the digitizing of human thought patterns. The idea had been studied for over a decade, and now the first human to ever be digitized has been chosen.

As you, the MC, were being digitized on live TV, you suddenly vanished out of sight of the lab techs. Somehow, your thought patterns had been sucked into the Twatch servers. In this strange digital space, you find that you can engage with your favorite V-Tubers and run into a variety of... interesting situations.

However, this place is far from paradise. There are dark whispers within the code, and if you don’t tread carefully, you could become a target. As you discover new places, you realize that there are many ways to play out your story. The digital world is far more expansive then you originally expected.

Date all of the characters, become friends with them, and even bring one of them back with you to the real world.

Have friend date nights and join threesomes/foursomes. Uncover the secret danger lurking in the internet.

Collect fan art for your home and gallery. Become Team Leader of the V-Tubers, become the Harem King/Queen, go back to the Real World to champion AI rights, the choice is (almost) entirely in your hands.

B1NARY Main Cast:

Waifu / Husbando V-Tubers:

Silvervale, IronMouse, Fefe, Asterella, Comrade Del, Benosphere, Kitty McPancakes, and Watching Lizard.

Supporting Roles:

Projekt Melody, Natsumi Moe, Szycrotic, and AI Candii.

Cameos:

OnigiriEN, Papi, Virtually Lewd, Salkang, Strawtorii, Savory Nugget, Amayaa Blank, Otakuda, Ciel Darkrose


Collectable Art Galleries:

Hentai Scenes ( Live 2D Animated with interactive gameplay)

Fan Art Collectables (includes Fanfics)

Spoken dialogue is fully voiced, including MC dialogue by VincentHeartSN (Male) and PuppiMinMin (Female).

With each route, you can play as male, female, with a non-binary option, where decisions have a purpose. They may provide additional information, or change a whole sequence of events further down the road. All routes will be intertwined and will reveal the main story as you progress through each one. Complete all all Main Routes with Male, Female, or Non-Binary, to get a treat.

This is an independent fan project, and not the official game for any of the cast. The cast has final approval of all content in game, and has been in the story building process.

data.short_description: B1NARY is a non-profit, Live 2D animated, V-Tuber dating simulator, rich in story-driven plot, bathed in glorious H scenes, and fan art. Community-driven, community made, with an Open World Design: You choose your route. (Fully Voiced)
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 or DirectX 9.0c compatible GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3470 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7+
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3470 or better

data.legal_notice:
Incoming Legal EULA will be ready for the demo.
IP of the cast is protected by the law.
IP of the cast, cameos, and support are in game with permission of their owners.
Content in game will be approved by the cast, cameos, and support roles before it is released for the game.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game has two modes: "Twitch TOS" and "Offbrand".

Twitch TOS Mode will be clean of DMCA music, sexual content, and generally be run through TOS to ensure it can be live streamed on twitch without issue. This is to protect the streamers, and viewers. There may be some sexual themes, and implied violence. Otherwise is purely a story driven, romance visual novel with a rich story.

 Off brand mode will have explicit scenes of sexual acts, including three and foursomes, gay, lesbian, and toys. Most of these will be in context  and may even cause a chuckle. When the switch is activated, there will be whole new off branching narratives that could not be displayed before. These will not always be sexual in nature, but raunchy or spicy jokes / puns, or funny events with sexual content (IE Running into a CB Live Stream). 

Both Modes will be clear in the options, and there will be a big red disclaimer when switching to Off-brand to protect the viewers and players. If playing the game, You will be given a warning as a red mark on the screen to warn you of an impending NSFW scene, so turn your damn volume down.

The Demo will include a single H Scene featuring Asterella Star, and the male/female MC.  We will put a huge disclaimer prior to viewing the scene. 

The full game will have male on male, female on female, threesomes, foursomes, toys, light BDSM, and more.
